metadata.title: Extending civic participation of Virtual Cultural Experiences: Brancacci POV experiments
metadata.description: Brancacci POV is an hybrid collaborative XR experience meant to let visitors to explore a Renaissance monument in Florence, together and guided by an expert. This research prototype has been used as experimental laboratory to explore complex concepts, dynamics and users behaviors (Caring attitude, VR in formal education and Social Cohesion) with the aim of developing new design strategies for Interactive Media in the Cultural Heritage and Cultural Tourist domains.
